mapper.sql: id, ser_list_id, operator, opreat_date, opreat_content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into ser_list_opreate_info (id, ser_list_id, operator, opreat_date, opreat_content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opreatContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update ser_list_opreate_info
ser_list_id = #{serListId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opreat_date = #{opreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opreat_content = #{opreatContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ser_list_opreate_info set ser_list_id = #{serListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opreat_date = #{opreatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opreat_content = #{opreatContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.ser_list_no, b.operator, b.opreat_content, date_format(b.opreat_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as opreat_date from ser_list_mage a left join ser_list_opreate_info b on a.id = b.ser_list_id and a.del_flag = '0' where a.id = #{id} order by opreat_date desc
